data.description:
Gala Relax 5K is the ultimate relaxation app. Teleport to tranquil locations across the world, have the place all to yourself so you can chill, relax and meditate in highest quality 360 videos.
Gala Relax offers stunning true 5K resolution 2D 360 videos and 4K*4K 3D 360 videos (3D is Oculus Go only due to hardware performance)
Some locations are free and you only need to pay $3.99 to unlock all locations.
New locations will be added regularly. 
Videos are downloaded so you don't need wifi when you use it.
Oculus Go users will enjoy the 72hz mode.
All locations are unlocked automatically if you bought paid Gala Relax before, no need to pay again.

Recent new locations:
Ordesa National Park, Spain
Louvre, Paris
Mauna Kea Observatories, Big Island, Hawaii
Golden Gate Bridge
Old Venetian Harbour, Greece
Yun Nan, China
Iriomote Island, Japan
Zambia
The Antarctica

changelog.change_log: Try again if you couldn't download videos before, would be great if you could leave a review to tell us if it's working or not, thanks :)
If you can't download videos, please go to "Feedback" then use "Network Test", thanks so much. We're trying to locate the problem
Try to fix download failure for a small number of users. Please email gala360app@gmail.com if you can't download videos, thanks.
Fixed a bug that causes crash on GearVR. Please leave a review for 5K in Oculus Store if you enjoy it:) Really helps us to bring more high quality videos :)
Improved overall performance, please leave a review on Oculus Store if you like 5K, it really helps :)
Improved overall performance, please leave a review on Oculus Store if you like 5K, it really helps :)
UI update and performance boost. Please leave a review in Oculus Store if you enjoy 5K, your reviews really help us add more locations faster :)

Fixed a bug that videos don't play sometimes.

And now you can see the size of each video. Leave us a review in Oculus Store if you enjoy 5K :)
